title: Already Logged In to At Bat
custom_preconds:
Given At Bat is installed
and the user has logged in to At Bat with an MLB account that is not TV-entitled

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user navs to the MLB.TV EPG via the TV icon in the top left corner
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will be presented with the day's TV feeds
and there will be an MLB.TV upsell at the top

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps the MLB.TV upsell
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be presented with the TV paywall

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps "Login with another MLB.com account" from the TV paywall
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be taken to the Login screen

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps "Link MLB.TV to an existing subscription bundle” at the bottom of the login page
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be prompted that they will need to log in with mlb.com credentials

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps "Continue" from the prompt
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be taken to a webview where they can select Extra Innings or Amazon Prime

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user selects "Extra Innings"
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be prompted to enter their MLB account credentials

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user enters valid MLB account credentials
(should be the same account info that the user previously used to log in to the app with)
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user is asked to select their cable provider

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user selects their cable provider from the drop down
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user is taken to the provider login page

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user enters valid cable provider credentials that include the Extra Innings package
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user is taken to a success page which includes messaging indicating that the linking has been completed
and the user is provided a button

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps the button from the success page
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user is deeplinked back to the app's login page

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user is returned to the app's login page
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user should see their MLB account email already filled in

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user navs back to the TV EPG
and selects a live or archive game
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user should be able to successfully launch the TV feed
